title: 用linux提示没有这样的文件
author: 凉拌记忆
txt_content:
求解决方法linux
./bin/php7/bin/php: error while loading shared libraries: libstdc++.so.6: cannot open shared object file: No such file or directory

replies.author: howarks
replies.txt_content:
查一下这个依赖：
yum whatprovides libstdc++.so.6

我查出来的是
libstdc++-4.8.5-36.el7.i686

直接 yum -y install libstdc++-4.8.5-36.el7.i686


(CentOS)

replies.author: 凉拌记忆
replies.txt_content:
tian_wc 发表于 2019-5-21 08:02
linux你用的哪个版本？
用的CentOS 7

replies.author: 凉拌记忆
replies.txt_content:
978682423 发表于 2019-5-21 11:53
查一下这个依赖：
yum whatprovides libstdc++.so.6
还是不行一样的提示
